title: How to Construct a 60 Degrees Angle Using Compass and Ruler

steps.title: Mark the vertex of your angle anywhere on the paper.
steps.content: Mark the vertex of your angle anywhere on the paper. Let us name this point as M . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Draw a ray MN, extending in any direction and of any length.
steps.content: Draw a ray MN, extending in any direction and of any length. This will be one of the arms of our angle. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Place the tip of the compass on point M and set its width to any measure less than the length of the ray MN.
steps.content: Place the tip of the compass on point M and set its width to any measure less than the length of the ray MN. [3] X Research source

steps.title: With the tip of the compass still on M, draw an arc so as to cut the ray MN at some point (say P).
steps.content: With the tip of the compass still on M, draw an arc so as to cut the ray MN at some point (say P). [4] X Research source

steps.title: Keeping the width unchanged, place the tip of the compass on the point P and draw another arc cutting the arc drawn in the previous step at some point (say Q).
steps.content: Keeping the width unchanged, place the tip of the compass on the point P and draw another arc cutting the arc drawn in the previous step at some point (say Q). [5] X Research source

steps.title: Connect the points M and Q with a straight line and extend it to form a ray ML.
steps.content: Connect the points M and Q with a straight line and extend it to form a ray ML. [6] X Research source The measure of the angle LMN is 60 O .
